Author: heyy240
Text: I have a dial scale and it cant read .01 pounds or anything like that but what I hate is that the needle sometimes looks like its between pounds or if I shift it starts to move again and I cant tell what it really is.

Author: arcoalien
Text: How about when you weigh yourself, then pee, then weigh yourself again 2 minutes later and somehow you gained 0.2lb according to your scale.
